mapper.select: SELECT name_thing,start_time,dead_time FROM demos.todo_quest JOIN demos.todo_group_quest gq on todo_quest.quest_id = gq.quest_id WHERE gq.group_id IN (SELECT tug.group_id FROM todo_user_group tug WHERE tug.user_id = #{userId}) AND dead_time IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE DEMOS.todo_quest SET finish = true WHERE name_thing = #{thing} AND quest_id IN (SELECT tgq.quest_id FROM todo_group_quest tgq WHERE tgq.group_id = #{groupId})
